sentences.en: ‘I promise,’ she repeated.
sentences.cn: “我保证。”她又说了一遍。

sentences.en: As a precautionary measure repeat the medication.
sentences.cn: 作为预防性措施，请重复用药。

sentences.en: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.cn: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.en: Don't repeat what I've told you to anyone, it's private.
sentences.cn: 不要向别人转述我告诉你的事, 这是保密的.

sentences.en: Find and destroy, repeat destroy, these units.
sentences.cn: 找到并且销毁，重复一下，销毁这些部件。

sentences.en: I asked her to repeat specifically the words that Patti had used.
sentences.cn: 我让她原原本本地重复一下帕蒂的措辞。

sentences.en: I repeat that medicine is on the brink of a revolution.
sentences.cn: 我要再次强调，医学面临着变革。

sentences.en: I'll repeat that so you can commit it to memory.
sentences.cn: 我会重复一下，好让你们记住。

sentences.en: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.cn: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.en: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.cn: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

sentences.en: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentences.cn: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

sentences.en: Next week they will swap places and will repeat the switch weekly.
sentences.cn: 下周他们将交换座位，并且以后每周换一次。

sentences.en: Repeat the exercises twice a day.
sentences.cn: 这套操每天做两次。

sentences.en: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.cn: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.en: Sports commentators repeat the same phrases ad nauseam.
sentences.cn: 体育解说员翻来覆去说着同样的词语，真叫人腻烦。

sentences.en: Television sports commentators repeat the same phrases ad nauseam.
sentences.cn: 电视体育解说员说来说去就是那么几句话,令人厌烦.

sentences.en: The team are hoping to repeat their success (= achieve the same good result ) of last season.
sentences.cn: 球队希望再续上一赛季的佳绩。

sentences.en: The twins didn't have to repeat their second year at school.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎不需要重读二年级。

sentences.en: This year can only see a repeat performance of the decline.
sentences.cn: 今年还会出现下降。

sentences.en: to repeat a question
sentences.cn: 重复一遍问题

sentences.en: We must not repeat the mistakes of the past.
sentences.cn: 我们不能再犯以前的错误。

sentences.en: What price a glorious repeat of last week's triumph?
sentences.cn: 还有可能再次上演上周的辉煌胜利吗？

sentences.en: Young children latch onto phrases and repeat them over and over.
sentences.cn: 小孩子喜欢成语,一遍遍地重复.

words.tran_cn: [通信] 中继器；[通信] 转发器；重复者

phrases.tran_cn: [美国英语]以及返程，打个来回

trans.tran_cn: 再次发生，重播，重复部分
trans.tran_en: an event that is very like something that happened before

trans.tran_cn: 重复； 重说； 重做
trans.tran_en: to say or write something again

trans.tran_cn: 重复，复述，反复说，重复做，重复发生，留有余味
trans.tran_en: to say or write something again

trans.tran_cn: 重说， 重做； 重复
trans.tran_en: to say or write something again
